events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized under the Refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Let's get this sorted out for you quickly.
Could you please provide a photo of the received item and the order confirmation so we can process your refund?
I have attached pictures of the item I got and my order receipt as requested. Please review them and proceed with the refund.
Thank you for the photos. We will initiate your refund today and you should receive the amount back within 5 to 7 business days.
Thanks for the prompt response and quick solution. I appreciate your help in resolving this issue smoothly.
The refund process has been completed successfully, and the case is now resolved from our side.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund without any issues. Thanks for following up and all your help!
Closing the case now as the refund has been received and the customer confirmed satisfaction with the resolution.
